name: Coloring (abduki)
description:
Graphics inspired by Color Switch.

In this game you have to press the space bar or touch the screen to match the pointers color with ring color so you get a point. Everytime you get a point the pointer rotates a little bit faster. After ten points even the ring starts to rotate.

How to play:

Desktop: Press Space Button at the right color to get a point.

Mobile: Touch Display at the right color to get a point.
